description: Presentation period must not exceed 21 days from shipment date.
suggestion: Add: 'Documents must be presented within 21 days from shipment date.'

description: LC should state an expiry date and place.
suggestion: Add explicit expiry date and place of expiry for the credit.

description: LC should state the place of expiry.
suggestion: State the place of expiry where presentation must occur.

description: Presentation period phrased as 21 days from shipment/on board.
suggestion: Add wording: 'Documents must be presented within 21 days after shipment/on board date.'

description: Latest shipment date should be stated (and be logically before expiry).
suggestion: State a 'Latest shipment date' that precedes the expiry date by at least 21 days.

description: Amount and currency should be clearly stated in a consistent numeric format.
suggestion: State the credit amount with currency code and consistent separators (e.g., USD 100,000.00).

description: Required transport document should match the shipment mode (e.g., B/L for sea, AWB for air).
suggestion: Specify the correct transport document (e.g., 'Full set of original Bills of Lading' or 'Air Waybill').

description: Named ports/places should be consistent with document requirements.
suggestion: State both Port of Loading/Place of Receipt and Port of Discharge/Place of Delivery.

description: Named airports should be consistent with document requirements for air shipments.
suggestion: State both Airport of Departure/Loading and Airport of Destination/Discharge.

description: Terms on partial shipments should be explicit and unambiguous.
suggestion: State clearly: 'Partial shipments allowed' or 'Partial shipments not allowed'.

description: Terms on transshipment should be explicit and unambiguous.
suggestion: State clearly: 'Transshipment allowed' or 'Transshipment not allowed'.

description: For CIF/CIP, insurance coverage should be at least 110% unless otherwise stated.
suggestion: Require insurance cover for CIF/CIP shipments for at least 110% of the invoice value.

description: On-board notation and date should be present when required (e.g., B/L).
suggestion: Require on-board notation with on board date on the transport document.

description: Place of presentation should be stated if not standard.
suggestion: State the place where documents must be presented (e.g., bank branch and city).
